means: (Gaius Sallustus Crispus)塞勒斯特(公元前86～前34,古罗马历史学家、政治家)

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile Sallust and Glaucus were slowly strolling towards the house of Diomed.
sentence.Network_cn: 与此同时,萨罗斯特和格劳科斯正向狄俄墨德的邸宅慢步踱去.

sentence.Network_en: Sallust received the appointment with becoming humility.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨罗斯特用很适宜的谦恭态度接受了这项任务.

sentence.Network_en: Sallust said that anyone is his own futural architect.
sentence.Network_cn: 塞·勒斯特说过:任何人都是自己未来的建筑家.
